configuration.stem: Arrange the statements into the order that accurately shows the sequence of events described in Margulisâ€™s hypothesis.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the cause-and-effect relationships between the events described.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Prokaryotes were engulfed by other prokaryotes, which led to a symbiotic relationship, then to the development of membrane-bound organelles, and then to the development of eukaryotic cells.

options.ddoText: Prokaryotes inside other prokaryotes evolved into organelles.
Prokaryotes lived inside other prokaryotes in a symbiotic relationship.
Prokaryotes that had engulfed other prokaryotes evolved into eukaryotes.
Free-living prokaryotes engulfed other free-living prokaryotes.
